---
title: "summary stats SA1"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(psych)
```

```{r}
AA_C_sumstats <- headscan_full %>% 
  group_by(race_eth) %>%
  summarise(n = n(),
            min = min(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            max = max(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            mean = mean(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            sd = sd(AA_C, na.rm = TRUE),
            na = sum(is.na(AA_C)))

AA_C_sumstats <- AA_C_sumstats %>% 
  mutate(across(where(is.numeric), round, 1))
           
kable(AA_C_sumstats, 
      caption = "Alare Alare Contour SumStats for each Race/Ethnicity")
```
